ComicInfo.Summary:
Everything ends this prog as the current line-up of stories come to a close before next weeks Annual Prog 2014. Just four stories this issue, with a double-helping of 'Flesh'.
Cover: Henry Flint (Flesh)
Judge Dredd - Ferals (part 4 - final part) (Emma Beeby - John Burns)Flesh - Badlanders (part 12 - final part) (Pat Mills - James McKay and Lee Townsend)Brass Sun - The Diamond Age (part 12 - final part) (Ian Edginton - INJ Culbard)Damnation Station - After Losing Every Battle (Al Ewing - Mark Harrison)
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-23 14:44:21. [CVDB435338]
